City Council
============



The Clarksville City Council meets on the 3rd Tuesday of each month at 6:00 p.m at:

**Clarksville City Hall
800 West Main Street
Clarksville, Texas 75426**

[View Larger Map](http://maps.google.com/maps?f=q&source=embed&hl=en&geocode=&q=%09Clarksville+City+Hall+++(903)+427-3834++800+W+Main+St,+Clarksville,+TX&sll=37.0625,-95.677068&sspn=39.047881,58.271484&ie=UTF8&hq=&hnear=800+W+Main+St,+Clarksville,+Red+River,+Texas+75426&ll=33.610331,-95.05517&spn=0.02123,0.025749&z=14&iwloc=A)

[![Click for Larger View](http://clarksvilletx.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/ClarksvilleWardMap.jpg)](http://clarksvilletx.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/ClarksvilleWardMap.jpg)







The City of Clarksville is giving notice of the City’s intent to submit a Texas Community Development Block Grant Program grant application for a Community Development Fund grant request of $350,000 for reconstruction and drainage improvements for portions of North Pecan Street and South Delaware Street in the City of Clarksville. The application is available for review at Clarksville City Hall during regular business hours.
*Para obtener una copia en español, comuníquese con la secretaria de la ciudad al 903-427-3834.*



The City of Clarksville has instituted a mass communication system to send emergency alerts and other important news and notifications. Subscribers can register to receive alerts via phone call, text message, and/or email by signing up
[here](https://clarksville-tx.myfreealerts.com/)
